TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EdmRelationshipAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class EdmRelationshipAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class EdmRelationshipAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定义两个实体类型之间的基于概念性模型中关联的关系。

span.span: Defines a relationship between two entity types based on an association in the conceptual model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性以程序集级别应用于每个关联的一个实例。This attribute is applied at the assembly level with one instance for each association. 程序集中可以具有此类型的多个属性。There can be multiple attributes of this type in an assembly. 特定关联中实体类型的角色的详细信息应匹配概念性架构中定义的关联。The details for the role of an entity type in a particular association should match the association defined in the conceptual schema. 关联不为角色定义任何排序。An association does not define any ordering for the roles. 这意味着定义关联的相关端的属性可按任何顺序定义。This means that properties that define the related ends of an association can be defined in any order.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RelationshipName As String
public: property System::String ^ RelationshipName { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Name of the relationship.

value.span: 一个 ，表示此 定义的关系的名称。

span.span: A that is the name of a relationship that is defined by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定关系的名称`Name`属性的`Association`概念模型中定义此关系的元素。The name of the relationship is specified by the `Name` attribute of the `Association` element that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[CSDL、 SSDL 和 MSL 规范](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/csdl-ssdl-and-msl-specifications.md)。For more information, see [CSDL, SSDL, and MSL Specifications](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/csdl-ssdl-and-msl-specifications.md).

public: property System::String ^ RelationshipNamespaceName { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: The namespace for the relationship.
A that is the namespace for the relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定关系的命名空间`Namespace`属性的`Schema`该元素包含在概念模型中定义此关系的关联。The namespace of the relationship is specified by the `Namespace` attribute of the `Schema` element that contains association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[CSDL、 SSDL 和 MSL 规范](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/csdl-ssdl-and-msl-specifications.md)。For more information, see [CSDL, SSDL, and MSL Specifications](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/csdl-ssdl-and-msl-specifications.md).

span.span: Multiplicity at one end of the relationship.
A value that indicates the multiplicity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以按任何顺序来定义用于定义关联的相关端的属性。Properties that define the related ends of an association can be defined in any order. 指定多重性`Multiplicity`属性的`End`概念模型中定义此关系的关联中的元素。The multiplicity is specified by the `Multiplicity` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[CSDL、 SSDL 和 MSL 规范](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/csdl-ssdl-and-msl-specifications.md)。For more information, see [CSDL, SSDL, and MSL Specifications](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/csdl-ssdl-and-msl-specifications.md).
